column4: Oct. 11 – Cambodian female Pétanque athletes Ke Leng and Ouk Sreymom have won world’s gold medal in the Pétanque game in France.------Coach of Cambodian Pétanque Im Phat said Wednesday that this world championship competition was unique from other world competition
column7: invited only top countries in the region
column8: of which Cambodia has sent six players to participate under the leadership of In Kimsrun
column9: Secretary General of the Cambodian Pétanque Federation.------
